stimulusHtml: The tendency of Northern Renaissance artists to focus on contemporary individuals as well as themes of everyday life is most closely connected to which of the following developments in northern Europe during the sixteenth century?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the Northern Renaissance.

choicesHtml: The growing prosperity of new commercial groups
The spread of knowledge about European exploration of Africa, Asia, and the Americas
The attempts by new monarchs to create more centralized states
The increasing production of vernacular texts
